Text: wushdishmeen i`ve been meaning to tell you how amazing it is that you post all the howard stern shows. thank you very very much for that. i just started to get into the show about the last 7 or 8 years or so. i love the show and everything that goes with it. would you have the history of howard stern acts 1 and 2? i`m having trouble dl`ing it. i would love to add them to the archive.
